body.p: The HTML pages that comprise the output of a WebHelp Responsive system are obtained after processing HTML template pages.
There are four types of template pages:

ol.li: Main page template - Used to produce the home page of the WebHelp Responsive output.
Topic template - Used to generate the HTML pages associated with a topic.
Search results template - Used to generate the HTML page that presents the search results.
Index terms template - Used when generating the HTML page that presents the documentation index.
